entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:08 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 06:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then snow beginning early this afternoon. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers and flurries this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
